AD_Bandit_Caster_01_CrushedReaction.synopsis: A bandit reacts to finding one of her companions dead in an apparent accident. She looks on the bright side.

nodes.speaker: Quelenna
nodes.text: Well, that's one less greedy bastard to share the loot with.
nodes.context: NodeContext: with a shrug - found a dead companion and sees the bright side

BanditWestInteraction.synopsis: Alternate version of the confrontation scene between Gimblebock and his bandits at the crypt - triggers if the player approaches the scene from the side, alerting Warryn first.

nodes.speaker: Warryn
nodes.text: You! Not another step, hear me?
nodes.context: NodeContext: Sharp ultimatum mixed with a little surprise. Found the player approaching from the side of the structure.

nodes.speaker: Warryn
nodes.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hollering down to Gimblebock, his leader (down some steps behind Warryn, out of view).NodeContext: Hollering down to Gimblebock, his leader (down some steps behind Warryn, out of view)

nodes.speaker: Gimblebock
nodes.text: What's this then - trying to creep around us and loot the crypt? Not happening.

nodes.speaker: Gimblebock
nodes.text: Or is it the ship you're after? Don't matter either way - it's ours, all of it.
